title: Saturday lecture: Medieval food
itunes:title: Saturday lecture: Medieval food
itunes:subtitle: Chris Woolgar presents a broad survey of what, when and how people ate during the middle ages. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
In the second of five talks from our virtual Medieval Life and Death Day event, historian Chris Woolgar presents a broad survey of what, when and how people ate during the middle ages. Historyextra.com/podcast

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
